data.name: The Last Leviathan - Name a Port In-Game Upgrade
data.detailed_description:
This DLC gives you the right to name a Port with a description and have them entered into the game.
Port's are big feature in our Voyage Mode and this DLC will enable you to name one of the few Port’s available in the Voyage mode, which pretty much means that you’re a WINNER in life and everything!

ALL Players will be able to view your GENIUS, then trade, lay siege and generally enjoy your haven until their they’ve eaten their fill and sedated their desires…

You'll enter your Port name and backstory through our Kracking Rewards Achievement Kindred Entertainment Network (KRAKEN)(aka website) where we'll either approve it or give feedback if it doesn't quite fit.

Note: This DLC doesn’t change the game in any way – it only gives you the right to enter your content into the game.

Your Port name must follow the KRAKEN guidelines:
  • nothing too naughty - we have kids playing you know!
  • Keep it in theme: this is a Viking, Monster ship game where you destroy most of the things you encounter
  • Name must be no longer than 25 Characters
  • Description must be no longer than 150 Characters

    NOTE: Refunds are NOT available on DLC. Once we've added the content it will stay in the game forever...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64/32 bit
  • Processor: Core i5 (2.4Ghz Dual Core) or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 6750 / GTX 760 (1Gb Ram)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 64/32 bit
  • Processor: Core i7 (4Ghz Dual Core) or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2Gb Dedicated VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X El Capitan (10.11)
  • Processor: Core i5 (2.4Ghz Dual Core) or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GT650m or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X El Capitan (10.11)
  • Processor: Core i7 (4Ghz Dual Core) or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD R9 M370 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or higher
  • Processor: 2.4Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 Compatible, 1GB VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
